# ENV

## Linters

| Linter                                | Configuration key           | Additional                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|---------------------------------------|-----------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [dotenv-linter](env_dotenv_linter.md) | [ENV](env_dotenv_linter.md) | [![GitHub last commit](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/dotenv-linter/dotenv-linter)](https://github.com/dotenv-linter/dotenv-linter/commits) [![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/dotenv-linter/dotenv-linter?cacheSeconds=3600)](https://github.com/dotenv-linter/dotenv-linter) ![autofix](https://shields.io/badge/-autofix-green) |

## Linted files

- File extensions:
  - `.env`

## Configuration in MegaLinter

| Variable                 | Description                   | Default value |
|--------------------------|-------------------------------|---------------|
| ENV_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter |               |
| ENV_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter |               |
